title: No health bars and summoner names
body: Hello! I'm currently sitting with a problem, my health bars on champions as well as summoner names do not appear in-game, and I'm just returning back to league after a while, is this intentional? Or is it some bug. I cannot press shift L or CTRL  K to enable anything.

replies.body: You are able to change that in the options/settings. In your client. Click on the symbol beside the X(that closes your client). Go to INTERFACE, and under HEALTH AND RECOURCE BARS you can change if u want the names or health bars be seen or hidden.
They are set on as default, but when I go in game me, or my teammates or my enemies have no health bars, this is only for my game I believe.

Try giving your config settings a hard reset to see if that helps, and if not you may need to try a quick repair to fix any possibly missing or damaged files. Let's be sure to try the config reset first though ^_^!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
League of bugs, had the same problem today...
yeah, same problem here. it as a really frustrating way to lose
Yes, I have had that same bug happen to me. I didn't turn them off either, but restarting the game should fix it.
Just had the bug happen to me. I had to dc and restart client. Made me lose my ranked game. quite angry about it.
